opinion:
541 U.S. 903 (2004)

BOY SCOUTS OF AMERICA ET AL.
v.
WYMAN, IN HER CAPACITY AS COMPTROLLER OF THE STATE OF CONNECTICUT AND AS A MEMBER OF THE CONNECTICUT STATE EMPLOYEE CAMPAIGN COMMITTEE, ET AL.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 335 F. 3d 80.
